author: Reuters
description: “Terrorism has spread across the world. But the path to peace begins right here, on this ancient soil, in this sacred land."
title: Trump: Middle East Must Step Up In Fight Against 'Islamist Extremism'

author: PTI
description: Donald Trump tweeted for the first time on international soil as President, writing that it was “great” to be in Saudi Arabia
title: Donald Trump receives regal welcome in Saudi Arabia
